## Welcome, Class of 2025!

This website provides lectures and R examples for the Statistical components in the __*Foundations: Molecules to Populations*__ course at the Carle Illinois College of Medicine. The lectures are given at each Wednesday morning. 

## Weekly Schedule

  * __Week 1 (July 7)__: [History and Scope of Statistics](week1.html)
  * __Week 2 (July 14)__: [R Intro and Basic Statistics](week2.html)
  * __Week 3 (July 21)__: [Testing Mean Differences and Associations](week3.html)
  * __Week 4 (July 28)__: [TBL - Correlation and Linear Regression](week4.html)
  * __Week 5 (Aug 4)__: [TBL - Classification and Logistic Regression](week5.html)
  * __Week 6 (Aug 11)__: [Survival Analysis and Beyond](week6.html)
